headline: 3 Cyclical Stocks to Buy for Snapback Potential in 2026
summary: CROX, GIII and DOV are a few beaten-down cyclical stocks poised to benefit from easing rates, resilient consumer spending and a potential U.S. economic rebound in 2026.

headline: Dover (DOV): Valuation Check as 4Court Media Expands Advertising at Fuel Dispensers
summary: Dover (DOV) just rolled out a fresh angle on gas station screens, with its Dover Fueling Solutions unit launching 4Court Media, a retail media network that turns fuel dispensers into targeted ad inventory for brands. See our latest analysis for Dover. The launch of 4Court Media fits neatly into a year where Dover’s 1 month share price return of 8.94% and hefty 3 year total shareholder return of 50.89% signal steadily building momentum around its growth and efficiency story. If this kind of...
